rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: The Entrance Hall sets the tone with traditional Kerala aesthetics. It includes a foyer area leading to other parts of the house.

rooms.name: Kitchen & Dining Area
rooms.location: South side adjacent to entrance hall
rooms.description: A compact kitchen space featuring essential amenities, paired with an adjoining dining area. The design integrates local materials and Vastu principles by aligning the workspace in the South-east direction.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment
rooms.description: A multifunctional space designed as a studio apartment that can serve as living room, bedroom, and study area. The layout includes built-in storage and flexible partitions to manage a tight budget.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.location: West wing near the entrance hall
rooms.description: A quiet zone for reading and reflection, strategically placed in alignment with Vastu principles by ensuring natural light from the North. Built using sustainable local materials.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A small home theater designed for an immersive experience. The room has soundproofing and strategic placement to minimize distractions, while still remaining budget-friendly.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A dedicated space for storage and laundry utilities. Compact design ensures efficient use of available area.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A serene bedroom with ample natural light. The orientation aligns with Vastu principles for restful sleep.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Compact space intended for occasional guests, designed to be versatile and budget-friendly.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A functional bathroom with a focus on efficient use of space and sustainable water usage.

rooms.name: Study/Workroom
rooms.description: A dedicated area for work or study, ensuring productivity while adhering to Vastu guidelines by situating it in the North direction.

openings.location: Upper Floor West side near Master Bedroom

terrace.description: A spacious rooftop terrace providing a private outdoor space with views of the surrounding area. The design incorporates traditional Kerala-style features, including stone pathways and plantation-friendly zones.

vastu_alignment.north: The main entrance and key areas (Library, Home Theater) are aligned to the North to ensure positive energy flow.
vastu_alignment.east: Kitchen and Study area are oriented towards the East for enhanced productivity and clarity of thought.
vastu_alignment.south: Guest Bedroom and Utility Room benefit from a southward orientation to maintain balance in energy.

budget_considerations.description: Design choices emphasize cost-effectiveness by utilizing local building techniques and materials. Flexible spaces serve multiple functions to reduce construction costs.
